official_title: To limit occupancy of nonelderly single persons in dwelling units located in public housing projects for elderly families.
short_title: Public Housing for the Elderly Protection Act

summary.text: Public Housing for the Elderly Protection Act - Amends the United States Housing Act of 1937 to limit occupancy of nonelderly single persons in public housing projects for the elderly.

titles.title: Public Housing for the Elderly Protection Act
